bibl.title: The Identity of the Goddess in Alcman's Louvre Partheneion (PMG 1).
bibl.note: P. Paris Louvre Inv. E. 3320; Nouveau No. 71 (= Pack2 78). - The maidens in Alcman's Partheneion strive to emulate and attain the erotic beauty of Aphrodite.
bibl.seg: SILVEIRA CYRINO Monica, The Identity of the Goddess in Alcman's Louvre Partheneion (PMG 1).
P. Paris Louvre Inv. E. 3320; Nouveau No. 71 (= Pack2 78). - The maidens in Alcman's Partheneion strive to emulate and attain the erotic beauty of Aphrodite.
